group_1.narration: At our school, we bring lunch from home.@We can decide where to sit and eat, too.
Most people just end up staying@in their classroom and eating with their@classmates, like most schools.
We usually talk about pretty simple@and unimportant things while we eat,@but today was different.

group_1.textRight: Oh yeah, the cops came by my place too!

group_1.textLeft: Say what? Really?
That's so scary.

group_1.textRight: They only spoke to my mom, but they were@really grilling her!

group_1.textLeft: What kind of things were they asking?

group_1.textRight: It was all pretty much like, "Have you seen@this person around?"
Stuff like that!

group_1.textLeft: Whoa, just like in a crime show!

group_1.textRight: Seriously!

group_1.textLeft: What did the person do? The one they were@looking for.

group_1.textRight: I think they robbed somewhere!

group_1.textLeft: Wow... It really is like a crime show.
Don't say that. This isn't some TV show.

group_1.textRight: Right! This is real!

group_1.textLeft: Don't you think bad stuff has been happening@in Kamihama way more lately?

group_1.textRight: Come to think of it, that apartment complex@where you live...

group_1.textLeft: Right, something happened there too!
Yeah. That was a while ago, though.

group_1.textRight: Didn't someone go missing?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah...

group_1.narration: Right. About 3 months ago there was an@incident where people went missing.
A father, a mother, and their only child@disappeared. They lived in Building 12.
All their furniture and belongings were@left untouched. Nothing got stolen.
They were just a normal, average family.@They weren't struggling with money, and they@weren't on bad terms with the community.
But one day, all of them just vanished,@like a puff of smoke.
Their strange disappearance even made@the news. People were curious, and I got@asked about it a lot back then.
But I never knew the family that disappeared,@so I couldn't really tell them much about it.

group_1.textLeft: Actually, I heard something too.
Didn't some weirdo show up at the complex@where you live, Leila?

group_1.textRight: Huh? What? Where'd you hear that?

group_1.textLeft: My mom.
She works part time at the supermarket near@where Leila lives.
Is that true?
Yeah, I think so.
They put up posters saying "Watch out for@suspicious activity" and stuff.

group_1.textRight: Whoa, that's scary.
Are you okay, Leila?

group_1.textLeft: Well, I mean, so far I'm okay.

group_1.textRight: Don't say stuff like that!
And don't go anywhere by yourself!

group_1.textLeft: Oh, don't worry! I'm always with my friends@who live in the same complex, so it's fine!

group_1.textRight: Aw man, don't you think this whole thing...
...feels kind of like a horror movie?

group_1.textLeft: What do you mean?

group_1.textRight: Maybe that creepy person is stalking around,@searching for more people to abduct.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:800200:effect_emotion_angry_0][se:7219_strain]Hey, knock that off! That's where Leila@lives, you know!

group_1.textRight: Right! Sorry! I was only kidding! I just got@[chara:800100:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:800100:cheek_0][chara:800100:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:800100:lipSynch_1]carried away.

group_1.textLeft: Ha ha, it doesn't bother me. No worries!
(Here I go again, smoothing everything over.)
(Of course it's not okay.)
(I wonder if Seika and Mito are hearing the@same things right now.)
[chara:301301:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Ah!

group_1.textRight: [chara:800100:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]What?!
[chara:800200:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Is something wrong?!

group_1.textLeft: Oh, sorry! I just, um...
(I need to tell them that I'll be late @because of cleaning duty!)
